Title: DirectUI Library for Win32
Description: DirectUI sets up all the Direct2D boilerplate for you and wraps it up into a Win32 control for ease of use.
HomeWiki:
DirectUI is a library for easing the use of Direct2D and friends

DirectUI exports a custom Win32 control that aims to handle all the boilerplate and headache involved in using Direct2D in your software. All your code needs to do is respond to a few notifications; it's as simple as that.

The easiest method to include DirectUI in your own project is to use NuGet:
